TW CashoutsCIG The terminated CIG OBA had language to cashout at the NGPL MidCon price in the month after the OBA was terminated The index price was dth dth due CIG through October Mojave The old Mojave OBA does not have cashout language related to the termination date therefore the current month pricing would be used for cashout The March Bloomberg Natural Gas El Paso Topock AZ Mojave index price is dth dth due Transwestern through November Please let me know if you agree and I will prepare cashout documents Sue Mayher Senior Capacity Analyst Volume Analysis This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

Mojave Imbalance with TranswesternHi Michelle here are the months that there are scheduling discrepencies from January forward and the scheduled volume that I have I can fax you the daily volume for each of these months so we can narrow down the research Mojave TW Difference Mojave TW Difference Mojave TW Difference Mojave TW Difference Mojave TW Difference Mojave TW Difference Let me know your fax number if you need the daily volumes Sue Mayher Senior Capacity Analyst fax This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

TW Imbalances at Topock and TumbleweedMojaveTopock I have two months with different measured volumes than you have Please fax the Daily Volume Statement for Meter ID Meter Name TWMojave Topok IC DEL DRN for October and July My fax number is CIGTumbleweed I have looked back through October Measured Volume Difference Jul CIG dth TW Mar CIG dth TW CIG is the custody transfer meter Do you need meter statements to correct your records Scheduled Volume Difference Jul CIG TW Difference Apr CIG TW Difference Oct CIG TW Difference Aug CIG TW Difference Jul CIG TW Difference May CIG TW Difference Apr CIG TW Difference Jan CIG TW Difference Could you recheck your scheduled volumes Thanks Sue Mayher This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

TW imbalance confirmation Hi Michelle I found a copy of the imbalance confirmation sent by TW to Mojave for At that point your records agreed with Mojaves that the ending imbalance was due Mojave It is a little blurry but I can send a copy to you if you would like it Sue Mayher This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
